original_title: Money for Nothing Sex for Free
overview: A beautiful bride and her gallant husband enter by mistake into the den of an important drug baron, when they are actually looking for the nuptial suite. The girl suddenly finds herself in the middle of a transaction. This is never a place you want to find yourself! The new bride then finds herself being fucked, but not by her husband! And as if that wasn't bad enough, she finds that she likes it!
title: Money for Nothing Sex for Free
